Topic.Title: Eye Off The Storm: Writers Respect.

Posts.EditableText:
In Respect of the Writer of the original series RWBY.
the Eye Of The Storm Gamebook is Temporary Locked. 
Please help the writer of the original Series, More Information and how to help [url=http://www.gofundme.com/MontyandSheena:qwp3scx2]Here[/url:qwp3scx2]
Thank You.
Posts.HTML:
In Respect of the Writer of the original series RWBY.
the Eye Of The Storm Gamebook is Temporary Locked.
Please help the writer of the original Series, More Information and how to help Here
Thank You.

Posts.EditableText: Unfortunately The original Writer of RWBY, [url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monty_Oum:2cetk2pe]Monty Oum[/url:2cetk2pe], Has Passed Away. In memory of this amazing and loving Writer, artist, Directed and actor. I am putting the Gamebook Offline for a few days in Respect and I also put 'In Memory of Monty Oum' inside and outside my gamebook. More information about this unfortunate Passing here: http://roosterteeth.com/news/entry.php?id=5448468 The [url=http://www.gofundme.com/MontyandSheena:2cetk2pe]go fund me[/url:2cetk2pe] site is still available if you would like to help his Family and Friends out. Thank You
Posts.HTML:
Unfortunately The original Writer of RWBY, Monty Oum, Has Passed Away.

In memory of this amazing and loving Writer, artist, Directed and actor. I am putting the Gamebook Offline for a few days in Respect and I also put 'In Memory of Monty Oum' inside and outside my gamebook.

More information about this unfortunate Passing here: http://roosterteeth.com/news/entry.php?id=5448468

The go fund me site is still available if you would like to help his Family and Friends out.

Thank You
